# RoomTrackingProvider

**Class**

A source of real-time information about the room that a person is currently in.

## Declaration

```swift
final class RoomTrackingProvider
```

## Creating a room-tracking provider

- **init()**: Creates a room-tracking provider.

## Inspecting a room-tracking provider

- **allAnchors**: An array of the room anchors the room-tracking provider is tracking.
- **anchorUpdates**: An asynchronous sequence of room anchor updates.
- **currentRoomAnchor**: The room a person is in currently, if any.
- **description**: A textual representation of this room tracking provider.
- **state**: The state of a room-tracking provider.

## Type properties

- **isSupported**: A Boolean values that indicates whether a device supports the room-tracking provider.
- **requiredAuthorizations**: An array of authorization types the room-tracking provider requires.

## Room tracking

- **RoomAnchor**: The representation of a room ARKit is currently tracking.
- **SurfaceClassification**: A value describing the classification of a surface.
- **Building local experiences with room tracking**: Use room tracking in visionOS to provide custom interactions with physical spaces.

## Conforms To

- CustomStringConvertible
- DataProvider
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
